interpretation:
The "family: woman, woman, girl, boy" card represents the importance of familial relationships and the bonds that tie us together. This card is a reminder of the love, support, and comfort that can be found within a family unit. It encourages us to cherish and nurture these relationships, as they can provide a strong foundation of stability and security in our lives.

In a reading, this card may suggest a need to focus on family relationships, whether it be strengthening existing bonds or reconnecting with loved ones who may have drifted apart. It may also indicate a time of happiness and contentment within the family, with everyone working together in harmony and cooperation.

Overall, the "family: woman, woman, girl, boy" card reminds us of the importance of our family connections and the positive impact they can have on our lives.
